name: filingDate
description: Filing date of the 10-k that contained the data

name: cik
description: SEC Central Index Key identifying the issuer

name: textHash
description: Short hash of the textOfInterest field

name: docUrl
description: Path of the URL of the 10K filing where the data was filed. Append to prefix - https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/

name: textOfInterest
description: The text from the filing that contains the record holder data
